components/products/carousel:
{{#each products}}
{{> components/products/card settings=../settings theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer event="list" position=(add @index 1)}}
{{/each}}
components/products/card:
{{name}}

{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{> components/products/price price=price}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
{{#if theme_settings.card-show-brand}} {{#if brand.name}}

{{brand.name}}

{{else}}

{{/if}} {{/if}}
{{#and rating show_rating}}

{{> components/products/ratings rating=rating}}

{{/and}} {{> components/products/bulk-discount-rates}}
